vote.title: Authorize the (1) acceptance of a grant from the Summerlee Foundation Care of Communities Foundation of Texas in the amount of $50,000.00 for the restoration of the Juanita J. Craft Civil Rights House for the period April 28, 2021 through April 27, 2022; (2) receipt and deposit of funds in an amount not to exceed $50,000.00 in the Juanita Craft Summerlee Foundation Grant Fund; (3) establishment of appropriations in amount not to exceed $50,000.00 in the Juanita Craft Summerlee Foundation Grant Fund; and (4) execution of the grant agreement with the Summerlee Foundation and all terms, conditions, and documents required by the agreement - Not to exceed $50,000.00 - Financing: Summerlee Foundation Care of Communities Foundation of Texas Grant Funds
